#include<stdio.h>
int sum(int x)
{
    int i,s=0;
    for(i=x;i>0;i = i/10)
    {
        s = s+ i%10;
    }
    return(s);
}

int main()
{
    int n;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    while(n--)
    {
        int x,y,i;
        scanf("%d",&y);
        for(i=1;i<=y;i++)
        {
            x = sum(i);
            if((y-i)==x)
            {
                printf("%d\n",i);
                break;
            }
            if(i==y)
            printf("NONE\n");
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
